document_data.mainbody:
The Lake of the Leech was a small freshwater lake located in northern Gnarhelm on the island of Alaron within the Moonshae Isles.
The Lake of the Leech touched the northern edge of Leechhome, the only swamp in Gnarhelm. The lake was located just a few miles from Gnarhelms northern coast on the Sea of Swords. It covered roughly .
